Package org.douggschwind.games.chess.piece

Class ChessPiece

java.lang.Object
org.douggschwind.games.chess.piece.ChessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class ChessPiece extends Object
Represents the abstraction of which all pieces in a game of Chess are.

    • canMoveTo

      public abstract boolean canMoveTo(ChessBoard chessBoard, CommonMove proposedMove)
      Determines if the given piece can be moved from its current square to a target destination square.
      Parameters:
      chessBoard - Must be non-null.
      proposedMove - Must be non-null and properly populated.
      Returns:
      true if so, false if the piece is not allowed to be moved to the destination.
